FuncDef:
The entropy-label exp-mode command sets a mode of handling the EXP field in MPLS packets with label 7.
The undo entropy-label exp-mode command is used to restore the default configuration.
By default, the uniform mode is used.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the uniform mode of handling the EXP field in MPLS packets with label 7.
-

Indicates the pipe mode of handling the EXP field in MPLS packets with label 7.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To set a mode of handling the EXP field in MPLS packets with label 7, run the entropy-label exp-mode command. Either of the following modes can be set (take effect only on the egress PE):
uniform: The egress PE copies the EXP value in an MPLS packet to the EXP field in the IP or inner packet.pipe: The egress PE does not copy the EXP value in an MPLS packet to the EXP field in the IP or inner packet.

Precautions
The commands take effect only on the egress PE.
This command applies only to the Admin-VS.
